16 corn tortillas,2 cups oil, or as needed for frying,1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste,2 cups water,2 chiles, stems and seeds removed,1 white onion, quartered,3 cloves garlic,4 tomatoes, quartered,2 jalapenos, halved,1 teaspoon ground cumin,1 (14.5 ounce) fire-roasted diced tomatoes,2 teaspoons red wine vinegar,1 tablespoon olive oil,4 large eggs,1/2 cup queso fresco,1 avocado, sliced,1/4 cup crema,sliced radish, hot sauce, chopped cilantro,,
